function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Close collaboration between different specialists required for calibrating models","Impact":"Lack of collaboration may lead to inaccurate models and ineffective disease mitigation strategies","Mitigation":"Establish clear communication channels and interdisciplinary teams for collaboration","Technologies":"Communication tools, project management software","People":"Microbiologists, IAQ scientists, specialists in building flow dynamics","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Novel approaches required to improve air quality monitoring","Impact":"Failure to implement novel approaches may result in inadequate COVID-19 protection in indoor air","Mitigation":"Invest in research and development of AI and robotic technologies for air quality monitoring","Technologies":"Robots, AI, sensors, digital modeling, simulations","People":"Building operators, facility managers, public health organizations","Owner":"Technology developers, research institutions"},{"Description":"Inadequate monitoring of indoor air quality and pollutant levels","Impact":"Increased risk of indoor transmission of COVID-19 and other contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Install sensors in high-risk areas and continuously monitor indoor air quality indicators","Technologies":"Sensors, AI, digital platforms","People":"Building residents, facility managers, public health organizations","Owner":"Facility managers, building operators, public health organizations"}]}
